region.description: ISO 3166-2 region code where the city is located

regionName.description: The name of the region where the city is located

populationSize.description: The population size of the city

populationDensity.description: The inhabitants per square kilometer in the city

area.description: The area of the city in square kilometers

elevation.description: The elevation of the city in meters

biome.description: The environmental classification of the city

type.description: The biome where the city is located

lowIncome.description: The proportion of the population with a nominal monthly per capita income of less than 1/2 the minimum wage. This classification reflects levels of economic vulnerability. Categories: Very Low (0-4.23%), Low (4.24-7.08%), Medium (7.09-11.87%), High (11.88-18.17%), Very High(18.18-100%).

inadequateWaterAccess.description: The percentage of the population lacking adequate access to clean water. Categories: Very Low (0-7.32%), Low (7.33-14.35%), Moderate (14.36-23.11%), High (23.12-35.88%), Very High(35.89-100%).

inadequateSanitation.description: The percentage of the population lacking adequate access to sanitation services. Categories: Very Low (0-7.53%), Low (7.54-22.10%), Moderate (22.11-44.04%), High (44.05-70.86%), Very High(70.87-100%).

alignmentWithNationalPolicies.description: Whether the action aligns with national policies
